altTitles.ja: スケアリー・キャンパス・カレッジ・ユニバーシティ

description.en: An adolescent ghost story that invites college student's "desire". Drinking parties, looking for clubs, romance... Chigarashi Mahina, a freshman who is busy with her flowery college life, is haunted one night by ghosts after entering an abandoned building. Nights after nights, she had nightmares of her getting raped. She then seeks help from a specialist on campus, Makube Kaoru. That was the beginning of a college life filled with desire and fear...
description.ja: 大学生の“欲”が呼び込む青春怪談――。飲み会、サークル探し、恋愛……。“花の大学生活”に忙しい新入生・千嵐まひなは、立ち入った廃墟で、ある夜、幽霊に取り憑かれてしまった。夜ごと「犯される悪夢」に苦しむようになった千嵐は、救いを求めて学内の“専門家”間九部薫を訪れる。それこそが、欲望と恐怖に満ちた大学生活のはじまりだった――…。
description.vi:
Những hồn ma, những câu chuyện kinh dị được hiện thực hóa từ chính "lòng tham", "dục tính" của những sinh viên Đại học tuổi mới lớn.
Chigarashi Mahina, một cô gái trầm tính liều mình lao đầu vào một buổi tiệc thác loạn trá hình của giới sinh viên hòng tìm cho bản thân một tình yêu để bù vào những năm tháng cấp ba không có thanh xuân của mình.
Trong lúc vô ý đi vào một tòa nhà bỏ hoang, cô đã bị vô số hồn ma đáng sợ ám phải. Để rồi kết quả là mỗi lần đi ngủ, cô phải chịu đựng vô vàn những trận cưỡng hiếp tập thể hằng đêm bởi những hồn ma đó. Tuyệt vọng, cô tìm đến sự trợ giúp của Makube Kaoru, một "chuyên gia" bí ẩn trong khuôn viên trường Đại học mà cô đang theo học, hòng tìm kiếm sự cứu rỗi.
Và đó chính là sự khởi đầu cho một đời sinh viên đầy kinh hoàng và chết chóc của cô...

altTitles.ja: 現実主義勇者の王国再建記

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki

altTitles.en: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom
A Realist Hero's Kingdom Restoration Chronicle

altTitles.fr: Comment un Héro réaliste reconstruit un Royaume

description.en: "O, Hero!", with that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure -did not begin. After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?
description.fr: « Bonjour, Héros ». Après une convocation tout à fait banale dans un autre monde, Kazuya Souma se retrouve à l'aube d'une aventure épique–ou peux être pas. Après avoir présenté un plan pour renforcer économiquement et militairement le pays qui l'avait invoqué, le roi décide subitement de céder son trône à notre héros pour le meilleur et le pire, sans même demander l'avis de Kazuya. Et par-dessus tout, Kazuya se retrouva ainsi fiancé avec la propre fille de l'ancien roi. Afin d’obtenir un pays stable, il fera appel à tous les talents, les sages et les génies pour qu’ils soient à ses côtés. Cinq personnes se réunirent autour de Souma nouvellement couronné pour l’assister. Quels sont ces nombreux talents et les capacités qu’ils possèdent …!? Quelle sera la voie qu’il décidera d’emprunter pour ainsi révolutionner entièrement ce monde fantastique.
description.ja:
異世界に突如として勇者召喚された相馬一也。だが、彼の“勇者”としての冒険は――始まらなかった。国王から国家の抱える危機と課題を聞き出した彼は、持ち前の現代の知識を活かし富国強兵策を提案。すると……「召喚されし勇者ソーマ・カズヤに王位を譲る！」なんと、あろうことか国王より譲位されてしまう。さらに王女をソーマの婚約者にすると発表され――!?

若き国王ソーマと腹心の仲間とが共に国家の再興を目指す異世界本格内政ファンタジー開幕！

altTitles.es-la: La fragante flor florece con dignidad

description.en:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High. This is the story of two people who are so close and yet so far apart.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.fr:
Bien qu'ils soient mitoyens, le lycée public Chidori pour garçons et le prestigieux lycée privé pour filles Kikyō continuent à entretenir leur tradition de se haïr mutuellement au plus haut point. Tsumugi Rintarō pensait la même chose, jusqu'à ce qu'il fasse la rencontre de Wakuri Kaoruko, élève de Chidori et habituée de la pâtisserie tenue par ses parents. Malgré la désapprobation et les préjugés de leurs camarades respectifs, Rintarō et Kaoruko vont petit à petit se rapprocher, et tant pis ce qu'en pensent les autres !

___
**Liens :**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
description.ja:
とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。そこに通う紬 凛太郎と、和栗薫子が出会い…。
“近くて遠い”二人が織りなす、鮮やかな青春彩る学園物語!!

とある場所に、隣接するふたつの高校がある。バカが集まる底辺男子校・千鳥高校と、由緒正しきお嬢様校・桔梗女子。強面で物静かな千鳥高校2年・紬 凛太郎は、実家のケーキ屋の手伝い中にお客として来ていた少女・和栗薫子と出会う。薫子との時間を心地よく感じる凛太郎だったが、彼女は徹底して千鳥を嫌う桔梗女子の生徒で……!?

___
- [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.es-la:
En cierto lugar, hay dos escuelas secundarias vecinas. El instituto Chidori, una escuela masculina de mala muerte en la que se reúnen los idiotas, y el instituto femenino Kikyo, una escuela femenina bien establecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, un fuerte y tranquilo estudiante de segundo curso del instituto Chidori, conoce a Kaoruko Wakuri, una chica que llega como cliente mientras ayuda en la pastelería de su familia. Rintaro se siente cómodo pasando tiempo con Kaoruko, pero ella es alumna de las chicas de Kikyo, una escuela vecina a la que no le gusta nada el instituto Chidori. Esta es la historia de dos personas que están tan cerca y a la vez tan lejos.
___
- [Twitter Oficial (JA)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
description.pt-br: Em um lugar específico, existem duas escolas secundárias vizinhas. A Escola Secundária Chidori, uma escola para rapazes considerada de nível inferior, onde se reúnem estudantes menos dedicados, e a Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma instituição bem estabelecida. Rintaro Tsumugi, um estudante do segundo ano forte e tranquilo da Escola Secundária Chidori, conhece Kaoruko Waguri, uma garota que aparece como cliente enquanto ajuda na confeitaria da sua família. Rintaro se sente à vontade passando tempo com Kaoruko, mas ela é uma aluna da Escola para Meninas Kikyo, uma escola vizinha que tem aversão à Escola Secundária Chidori. Esta é a história de duas pessoas que estão tão próximas e, ao mesmo tempo, tão distantes.

Ascendance of a Bookworm ~I'll Do Anything to Become a Librarian~ Part 2 "I'll Even Join the Temple to Read Books!"

description.en:
After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!

He was my best friend in the world. 
And that was enough.

Taesung and Wooyoung became best friends by chance when they were young.

Their friendship seemed to continue, even as they went to high school, but Wooyoung feels the desire to be more than just friends with Taesung.

Meanwhile, Taesung has become wary of Suhwa, who had become close to Wooyoung in high school. And an incident between Taesung and Suhwa causes a falling out between him and Wooyoung.

The two of them end up going to the same university without repairing the relationship. 

In order to rid himself of his feelings for Taesung, Wooyoung decides to cut off all contact and enlist in the army.  But he still struggles with his feelings.

After his military service, with Suhwa’s help, Wooyoung moves into an officetel, where he coincidentally reunites with Taesung…

The unrequited love which had started fresh and pure, had become gradually more intense as time passed.
Kwon Wooyoung felt like he was dying to have Go Taesung.

altTitles.ja: 赤い実の花は白

description.en: He is a sunny, hilarious, positive and obscure actor. He is a composed generous and graceful general manager. Because of a strange request, they began a long journey of attracting each other. What should they do? Nonsense, of course becoming lovers.

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

description.en: Tomokui Kanata has been reincarnated into the weakest race, goblin, and given a new name, Gobrou, after having undergone an unfortunate death. However, Gobrou has retained his previous life's memories and ability to learn skills from what he eats. In this alternate world of survival of the fittest, events unfold. Will a goblin party become the heroes of this world, in a delightful twist from your usual scenario?
description.pt-br: Tomokui Kanata reincarnou na raça mais fraca, a dos goblins e ganhou um novo nome, Rou, após ter morrido de forma infeliz. Entretanto, o goblin Rou preservou as lembranças de sua vida passada, ganhando uma evolução incomum, mas mantendo sua capacidade de ganhar habilidades por comê-los. Neste mundo alternativo de sobrevivência do mais forte, com o desenrolar dos acontecimentos, irá o grupo do goblins se tornarem os heróis deste mundo e o transformarem em um cenário totalmente diferente do habitual? Ele irá se tornar o herói deste mundo ou um soberano das trevas dominará a todos?

altTitles.en: TODAG : Tales of Demons and Gods

description.en:
Nie Li became the strongest Demon Spiritualist and stood at the pinnacle of the martial world. However, he lost his life during the battle with the Sage-Emperor and six deity-ranked beasts.  
  
His soul was then brought back to when he was still 13 years old. At this point in his life, Nie Li was considered to be the most pathetic of his peers. However, with the vast knowledge he accumulated from his previous life (his future), he began becoming stronger faster than anyone could expect. He also decided to help those who died nobly in his previous life become stronger as well.  
  
Aiming to avert the future destruction of his home by demon beasts, and to avoid his previous fate of ending up destroyed, Nie Li fights to protect his lover, friends, family and fellow citizens who died in the beast assault or its aftermath. He also aims to destroy the so-called "sacred family," who will abandon their duty and betray the city.
description.ru: Сильнейший в мире заклинатель демонов Не Ли погиб в битве с Мудрецом-Императором. Но его душа воплотилась вновь, вернувшись на десятилетия назад, в нём самом, тринадцатилетнем подростке. Теперь у него есть шанс исправить все ошибки, совершённые в прошлом: спасти от монстров родной город, защитить любимую, друзей и семью. В детстве Не Ли был самым слабым учеником в классе, имея духовную силу на уровне простых людей. Он и мечтать не смел стать воином, не говоря уже о заклинателе демонов, но опыт и знания, накопленные в предыдущей жизни, помогут ему стать сильнее. Ведь сейчас он знает то, что неведомо профессорам в их боевой академии.
description.es-la: Nie Li, el más fuerte Espiritista Demoníaco, en su vida pasada estuvo en la cima del mundo marcial, sin embargo, perdió la vida durante la batalla con el Sabio Emperador y sus bestias, al morir fue devuelto al pasado cuando tenía 13 años gracias a la ayuda del Libro Temporal del Demonio Espiritual y aunque en este momento él es el más débil de su clase con la ayuda de los vastos conocimientos que acumuló de su vida anterior, se transformara en un guerrero formidable.
description.pt-br: Nie Li, o mais poderoso Espiritualista Demoníaco e estando no topo do mundo marcial, perde sua vida durante a batalha com o Imperador Sábio e as seis bestas de nível divino, e sua alma volta ao passado para quando ele tinha 13 anos. Embora ele seja o mais fraco em sua classe, com o talento mais baixo no reino da alma Vermelho – o mais fraco dos reinos – com a ajuda de seu vasto conhecimento acumulado na sua vida passada, cresce mais rápido do que todos. Agora, ele irá tentar proteger a cidade que no futuro será invadida pelas bestas e que acabou sendo destruída, assim como sua amada, seus amigos e sua família que morreram pelo ataque das mesmas, e destruir a família Sagrada que abandonaram seus deveres e traíram a cidade em sua vida passada.

description.en:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.

title.en: Majo Taisen - The War of Greedy Witches

altTitles.ja-ro: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

description.en: Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches.” With the addition of the final witch, Joan of Arc, Walpurgis Night begins: Only one witch can survive, and have her wish granted!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: 天国大魔境

description.en: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
description.fa:
دنیایی پوچ که بچه‌ها در آن با رفاه کامل همراه با دیوارهایی که درون و بیرون را جدا می‌کنند، زندگی می‌کنند اما همه‌ی این‌ها زمانی تغییر می‌کند که یکی از بچه‌ها به نام تاکیو‌ پیامی با این متن دریافت می‌کند: «می‌خوای به خارج از چیزی که اون بیرونه بری؟»

حال از بهشتی که درحال نابودی است بچه‌ها ماجراجویی خود را آغاز می‌کنند.
description.fr: Dans un immense jardin coupé du monde, un groupe d'enfants jouit d'une vie douce et d'insouciance, protégé par des scientifiques. Le monde extérieur leur est inconnu mais certains d'entre eux se questionnent : qu'y a-t-il au-delà des murs de leur paradis ?Pendant ce temps, dans un Japon dévasté par un mystérieux cataclysme, Maru et Kiruko, deux adolescents de la génération post-catastrophe, tentent de survivre dans un monde désolé peuplé de pillards et de monstres difformes. Leur objectif : atteindre "le Paradis".
description.pt: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?
description.ru:
Две истории, которые непременно связаны…

Таинственный Мару — мальчик, у которого есть одна цель: найти «Рай»! На пути к ним он обрёл телохранителя — Кируко. Она тоже не так уж проста, как может показаться на первый взгляд. В этом путешествии к «Небесам» они вместе посетят много мест ушедшей эпохи и встретят разных врагов!

Токио — девочка, которая живёт за великими стенами «Небес»! Это место можно назвать раем. Вокруг высокие деревья, зеленая трава, плантации свежих овощей и даже есть небольшой водоем! Вместе с Токио здесь можно встретить и других детей, каждый из которых обладает своим особенным даром. В один из дней Токио получает сообщение: «Ты хочешь выбраться отсюда?» Кажется, с этого момента что-то странное начинает твориться в пределах «Небес»…
description.pt-br: Em um mundo pós-apocalíptico, dois jovens: Maru um garoto amigável e que esconde vários segredos; E Kiruko, uma garota impetuosa e protetora. Juntos eles vagam pelo cenário desolado em busca de um chamado "paraíso". Enquanto isso, em um outro lugar isolado do resto do mundo, vivem várias crianças sem saber do que acontece no exterior. Como essas duas histórias vão se conectar?

altTitles.ja: シルフの花姫

description.en:
In the Land of Wind, in the imperial capital of Ventfleur, Princess Natalia is enthroned after the loss of her family.  

The princess, idolized by her people as a "child of the spirits", only has her family's royal blade to assuage her grief. And in her mourning, she's approached by the cheery and elusive Sister Sara... who declares to stay at the princess' side as her duty, as a sister of the cloth. Or is she after something more...?

So begins the fantasy yuri adventure of a lonesome princess and meddlesome nun!
description.pt-br: Na terra do vento, na capital imperial de Ventfleur, a princesa Natalia sobe ao trono depois da perda de sua família. A princesa, idolatrada pelo povo como a “criança dos espíritos”, tem apenas a espada real como amenizar sua tristeza. E em seu luto, ela é abordada pela feliz e ardilosa irmã Sara... Que declara que irá ficar ao seu lado como seu dever, como parte do convento. Ou ela está atrás de algo a mais...?Assim começa o GL da princesa solitária e da freira enxerida!

altTitles.zh: 说谎的小狗会被吃掉的

description.en: The puppy is clearly an omnivore, then why does he have to pretend to be a carnivore? On his first day transferring into a new school, his secret was discovered by his fox classmate. Then begins his life of living under “threat”, but after spending more time with him, the fox isn’t actually too awful…?

altTitles.ja: ソアラと魔物の家

altTitles.en: Soara and the House of Monsters

description.en: One day a young warrior girl meets a dwarf who dedicates himself to constructing houses for monsters. A tale of building houses for myriads of creatures begins! After all, everyone needs a home.

altTitles.ja: アグネス仮面

description.en: Professional wrestler Yamamoto Shingo returned to Japan from a 5 year training trip in the US and Mexico, only to be greeted by his now defunct wrestling company: Yamato. He's come to find out that as soon as the president of the company passed away, the rival wrestling group Imperial Japan Pro Wrestling (IJPW) took down Yamato. Shingo is forced to seek revenge for Yamato by challenging the president of IJPW. One thing led to another, and now Shingo has been half-forced into working under IJPW as the new wrestler from Brazil: Agnes Mask.

altTitles.ja: 貞操逆転世界

altTitles.es-la: El mundo de la castidad invertida

description.en:
In our current society, most porn consumers are males, we are the ones who think with our d***** many times, we worship the female body and our society, products, advertisements and many other things are centered around that. But, what if it wasn't that way? What if, instead of men being the ones controlled by their sexual urges, women were the ones who bought porn magazines and had the most interest in sex? What if the moral standards between men and women were reversed?  
  
A non-H adaptation of a doujinshi series with the same name.
description.es-la:
En nuestra sociedad actual, la mayoría de los consumidores de porno son hombres, somos los que pensamos con nuestro p*** muchas veces, adoramos el cuerpo femenino y nuestra sociedad, productos, anuncios y muchas otras cosas se centran en eso. Pero, ¿y si no fuera así? ¿Y si, en lugar de ser los hombres los que controlan sus impulsos sexuales, fueran las mujeres las que compraran revistas porno y tuvieran más interés en el sexo? ¿Y si las normas morales entre hombres y mujeres se invirtieran?  
  
Una adaptación no H de una serie doujinshi con el mismo nombre.

altTitles.ja: １日外出録ハンチョウ

description.en: At a certain prison under the surface, the "bottom of the bottom" that is the Teiai Underground Labor Facility, there is a man who uses his "one-day outing passes" to go above ground and enjoy all the luxuries of life while living in the poor conditions of the underground. His name is Ootsuki, and he is the leader of Squad E and a master of enjoying himself all day long with eating, drinking, and having a great time.

altTitles.ja: PICK ME UP～低レア★英雄の成り上がり～
ピックミーアップ！低レア英雄の成り上がり

altTitles.ja-ro: Pick Me up!! Tei Rea Eiyū No Nariagari

description.en:
1-Star heroes are just fodder for learning a boss' attack patterns.

That was Seojin Han's philosophy when playing the notoriously difficult game Pick Me Up. But after being transported into the game as one of those 1-star heroes, he's got no choice but to rise in rank and defeat the player controlling him and his party.

Can a gacha game character hope to defeat a player akin to being his god?
description.pt-br:
No jogo de gacha mobile famoso por sua extrema dificuldade, o Mestre classificado em 5º lugar no mundo, "Loki" perde a consciência ao invadir a Masmorra.

"O quê? Eu sou um personagem de jogo agora?"

Depois de acordar, "Loki" percebe que ele se transformou em um Herói de Nível 1, 1 Estrela – 'Han Yslat'. Para retornar à Terra, ele deve liderar o Mestre e os heróis novatos e limpar o 100º andar da Masmorra!

"Você mexeu com o cara errado".

Esta é a história de transporte mais difícil  pelo Mestre Loki que nunca aceita uma única derrota.

altTitles.ja: バーサス

description.cs: Lidstvo bylo po stovky let utlačováno kvůli vzestupu a invazi našich přirozených nepřátel "démonů". Světu vládl "Velký král démonů" a jeho 47 "ďábelských vládců". Zatímco lidé žijí ve strachu, 47 lidí bylo vybráno z celého světa a zíkslai titul "Hrdinové" a připravují se na boj proti armádě velkého krále démonů. A nyní začíná plán jak zachránit lidstvo, jehož osud je teď na tenkém ledě.
description.en:
Centuries ago, humanity’s natural enemy, “Demons,” invaded the world and oppressed humankind. The Great Demon Lord and 47 subordinates known as Demon Lords have since dominated the world, while the human race lives on in fear.

In desperation, a last-ditch effort for humanity’s very survival is placed in the hands of 47 people gathered from across the world. These heroes will oppose the demon army and win back humanity’s freedom…or die trying!
___
Composition: [bose](https://mangadex.org/author/aa8eb4f2-d4a2-4c4e-b6e8-2394f3b09b71/bose)
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10569/episode/349625)
description.ja: 天敵“魔族”の台頭と侵攻により、人類が虐げられ続けて数百年。世界は“大魔王”と、その配下である47体の“魔王”により支配されていた。人々は怯えて暮らしながらも、世界中から選び抜かれた47人を“勇者”と名付け、魔王軍に対抗すべく準備を進めていた。そして今、人類の存亡を懸けた決死の作戦が始まろうとしていた―――。
description.ru:
Уже сотни лет человечество вынуждено существовать под гнётом своих естественных врагов — демонов, сумевших захватить мир. В их главе стоит Повелитель тьмы, и в подчинении его находятся сорок семь Королей.
Однако среди людей, чей дух сломлен вековым страхом, было отобрано столько же наречённых Героев, готовых сразиться с демонической армией. И, кажется, отчаянная борьба за судьбу человеческой расы начинается прямо сейчас...
description.pt-br: A humanidade foi oprimida por centenas de anos devido à ascensão e invasão do inimigo natural "demônios". O mundo era governado pelo "Grande Lorde Demônio" e seus 47 "Senhores Demônios". Enquanto as pessoas vivem com medo, 47 pessoas selecionadas de todo o mundo foram nomeadas "Heróis" e estão se preparando para lutar contra o exército do Rei Demônio. E agora, uma operação desesperada com a sobrevivência da humanidade em jogo estava prestes a começar.

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.ja: モミジｖｓカゲロウ

description.en:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
description.pt-br: Bai Lijin, uma fada que vivia no céu, comendo e bebendo sem se preocupar, quebrou o colorido vitral de Sua Majestade em seu aniversário e foi banida para o reino mortal. Agora ela tem que começar suas aventuras no reino mortal sem todos os seus poderes espirituais! Para sobreviver, a ex-fada tem que entregar comida… Uma fada carinhosamente boba, uma gentil gerente de restaurante, uma aluna reservada e uma garota de duas caras difícil de resistir, que comece a história de sua bela amizade e juventude!

title.en: Takano Junsa wa Aisare Kata ga Wakaranai

altTitles.ja: 鷹埜巡査は愛され方がわからない

altTitles.en: Officer Takano Doesn’t Know How to be Loved

description.en:
There’s no privacy and my junior isn’t cute, I want to leave this company housing asap…!! 
Takano, a straight-laced police officer with a “scary face” complex, is fed up of living together with his handsome junior Souma, a flashy guy who lacks charming behavior. “I can embrace you, Takano-san.”  One day, Takano who had been hurt by a senpai he admired since his school years, finds himself vulnerable and having a physical relationship with Souma….!? A police station love story between a smooth talker junior x straight laced type senpai.

altTitles.ja: おとなりに銀河

description.en:
After the death of his father, Kuga Ichirou, a shoujo mangaka fresh out of high school, has to take care of his two little siblings, Machi and Fumio, all by himself. Struggling to meet a deadline after his previous assistants get their manga debuts, he hires a new assistant through his editor. However, his life takes an unexpected turn after this new assistant is revealed to be a beautiful and mysterious girl…

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/a-galaxy-next-door/)
description.pt-br: Depois da morte de seu pai, Kuga Ichirou, um mangaká de shoujo recém-saído do colégio, tem que cuidar sozinho dos seus dois irmãos menores, Machi e Fumio. Lutando para cumprir o prazo depois que seus assistentes anteriores estrearam com mangá, ele contrata um novo assistente através do seu editor. Contudo, sua vida tem uma virada inesperada depois que esse novo assistente é revelada ser uma garota linda e misteriosa...

description.en: Chapter 3 in Naver's 2023 Rookie Short Story Collection (2023 루키 단편선).

altTitles.es: Un cierto cañón de riel científico

altTitles.th: เรลกัน แฟ้มลับคดีวิทยาศาสตร์

altTitles.ja: とある科学の超電磁砲
とある魔術の禁書目録外伝 とある科学の超電磁砲

description.en:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
description.ru:
Где-то на островах Южной Японии раскинулся Академия Сити - город, большинство жителей которого учатся и работают в школах юных эсперов. Обладатели паранормальных способностей в поте лица трудятся, чтобы познать свой дар и поднять владение им на новую высоту. Гордость школы Токивадай и всего города? Мисака Микото – третья по силе среди известных миру эсперов высшего уровня. У «Электрической принцессы» много полезных умений, одно из которых – ручной рейлган, то есть возможность своими электромагнитными способностями разогнать монетку где-то до трех Махов (на другом конце траектории стоять не рекомендуется). Но всех усилий Микото пока не хватает для решения двух насущных задач: отбиться от юрийных домогательств своей подруги Сирай Куроко и разобраться с наглым парнем по имени Камидзё Тома!


---

Why She Had to Go to the Duke

Kanojo ga Kōshakutei ni Itta Riyū

altTitles.fr: Comment Raeliana a survécu au manoir Wynknight

description.de: Von ihrem eigenen Verlobten zu Tode vergiftet werden?! Eunha ist nicht in die Geschichte eines Romans aufgewacht, nur um als ein unglückliches Extra wieder getötet zu werden. Um ihre Geschichte zu ändern, braucht sie eine Deckung...sechs Monate lang vorgeben, die Verlobte des männlichen Hauptcharakteren des Romans, Herzog Noah Wynknight, zu sein. Aber wird dieser kaltherzige, engelsgesichtige Dämon eines Mannes ihr wirklich helfen, ihr unglückliches Ende zu vermeiden?!
description.en: Poisoned to death by her own betrothed?! Eunha didn’t wake up in a novel’s story just to get killed off again as an unfortunate extra! To change her story she needs a cover… 6 months pretending to be the fake fiancée of the novel's male protagonist, Duke Noah Wynknight. But will this cold-hearted, angel-faced demon of a man really help her avoid another ill-fated ending?!
description.es: ¿Envenenada hasta la muerte por su propio prometido? ¡Eunha no se despertó en la historia de una novela para ser asesinada de nuevo como un personaje secundario más! Para cambiar su historia, ella necesita fingir 6 meses ser la novia falsa del protagonista masculino de la novela, el Duque Noah Wynknight. ¡¿Pero este demonio de un hombre de corazón frío y rostro de ángel realmente la ayudará a evitar otro final desafortunado?!
description.fr: Empoisonnée par son propre fiancé?! Eunha ne s’est pas réveillée dans l’histoire d’un roman pour se faire tuer! Pour changer son histoire, elle a besoin d'une couverture… six mois à prétendre être la fausse fiancée du personnage principal du roman, le Duc Noah Wynknight. Mais ce démon d'un homme au cœur froid et au visage d'ange l'aidera-t-il vraiment à éviter une autre fin malheureuse?!
description.hr: Otrovana od strane svog vlastitog zaručnika?! Eunha se nije probudila u romanu samo da bi završila ubijena kao nesretni višak! Da promijeni svoju priču, treba joj zaštita...6 mjeseci pretvaranja da je zaručnica glavnog muškog lika u romanu, zvanog vojvoda Noah Wynknight. Ali hoće li joj taj demon od čovjeka s kamenim srcem i licem anđela stvarno pomoći da izbjegne još jedan tragičan završetak
description.hu: Amikor Park EunHa meghal a modern kori Koreában, Raeliana McMillan, egy nouveau riche báró lányának a testében tér magához. Azonban ez nem egy hétköznapi világ - pontosan olyan, mint a regényben lévő, amit olvasott. Családja szereti, mintha egy tündérmesében lenne. De Raeliana messze áll a főszereplőtől - ő csak egy cselekményeszköz, akinek a vőlegénye általi meggyilkolása kezdeményezi a történetet. Raeliana nem szándékozik csendben elviselni sorsát. A szemét olyasvalakire szegezi, aki nagy hatalmi pozícióban van - a vieux riche férfi főszereplőjére, Noah Volstaire Wynknight hercegre. Célja, hogy megváltoztassa az eredeti történetet. A jövőbeni események ismereteit felhasználva Raeliana információt nyújt Noah-nak azzal a feltétellel, hogy eljátssza a hamis vőlegényét, de a kétszínű herceg keresztül húzza a számításait!
description.ru:
После неожиданной гибели Пак Ын Ха попадает в волшебный мир, где всё идёт по знакомому ей сюжету романа. Однако она - не главная героиня этой истории, ей досталась второстепенная роль со скорым трагичным концом! Чтобы избежать своей незавидной судьбы, она заключает контракт с герцогом Ноа Волстео Виннайтом. Но всё не так просто… За добрым и ангельским лицом герцога скрывается настоящий дьявол! Сможет ли она избежать судьбы, некогда прописанной на страницах?

description.en: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

description.en: Doosan and Taesan, who have been best friends since their student days, reunite at the Justice Arcade as adults. Despite their deep and unchanged friendship, a strange tension has recently developed between them, leaving Doosan feeling uneasy. “If we date and break up, we can't even stay friends." As they continue to drift through time without addressing their feelings, a new person suddenly appears, threatening to come between Doosan and Taesan!

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

Cheon Seju, had no choice but to join an organization to avenge his dead sister. After losing all hope in life, he meets a boy who reminds him of his sister and offers him a small act of kindness. 

If I had known that my light heart would become so heavy, I wouldn't have brought you with me.



"I told you, you'll always come first......." 

His gaze usually fierce gaze was different today. 
Cheon Seju's gaze was gentle, sweet and persistent.

"So take responsibility".

Cheon Seju was my first everything. He was the first person to ever reach out a hand to me, and gaze upon me. Sejin only accepted the man's hand because he offered it first and he only ever gazed upon him because he gazed upon him first. And that is how he fell in love with this sweet and affectionate man.

Sejin realized that he no longer wanted to be separated from Cheon Seju.
Where ever he goes, I'll go. 

"You are all I have left now......."

altTitles.ja: 俺にトラウマを与えた女子達がチラチラ見てくるけど、残念ですが手遅れです

altTitles.es-la: Las chicas que me traumaron me están mirando, pero desafortunadamente es demasiado tarde.

description.en:
Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. 

He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. His sister hates him. His mother neglected him. 

Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?! 

Thus commence a youthful romcom full of misunderstandings!
description.ja: 九重雪兎は昔から女運が悪い。両想いだと思っていた幼馴染にはフラれ、姉には嫌われ、母親には疎まれ――度重なるトラウマの果てに感情がぶっ壊れてしまう。そんな雪兎が高校に入学したら、彼にトラウマを与えてきた女子達がやたらと彼のことを気にかけてきて……!?　手遅れから始まる勘違い思春期ラブコメ、開幕！
description.es-la:
Yukito Kokonoe siempre ha tenido mala suerte. Es odiado por su madre, su hermana, y su amiga de la infancia, pensaba que tenían sentimientos mutuos, pero ella se siente frustrada antes de la confesión, e incluso hace travesuras durante sus heridas, y sus emociones se rompen después de repetidos traumas con muchas mujeres.

Sin embargo, cuando ingresó a la escuela preparatoria, ¿¡Las chicas que lo traumatizaron comenzaron a preocuparse por él ...!?
Esta es una comedia romántica de un adolescente incomprendido que comienza demasiado tarde.

description.en: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?
description.es-la: Eugene procede de una familia de famosos espadachines, pero es tachado de "espadachín defectuoso" Que a pesar de poseer extraordinarias habilidades defensivas su poder ofensivo es basura. Abandona su país y se matricula en la principal escuela del continente, la Academia de Magia. En la academia, le piden a Eugene que vaya a lo más profundo de la prisión sellada, donde se se encuentran criaturas míticas y él es el único al que no afecta el miasma que estas desprenden. Sellado en las profundidades más oscuras de la prisión, donde incluso los más grandes magos de todos los tiempos caen de rodillas en el camino, se encuentra a la legendaria Rey Demonio Erinyes, que una vez gobernó el continente. Eugene llega fácilmente hasta ella, y ¿Parece que es el único que puede hacer un contrato con la Rey Demonio...? Una historia fantástica de otro mundo en la que un espadachín caído que se ha hecho con el poder del Rey Demonio ¡se convierte en el santo de la espada más fuerte! ¡Una historia que transcurre en el mismo universo de Shinja Zero Megami!

altTitles.ja: はるかリセット

description.en: Haruka is a writer who is overwhelmed by deadlines and takes time out of her busy schedule to reset her mind. Strolling around the neighborhood, soaking in the public bath, eating the local cuisine, enjoying the park... even though she can’t take a big vacation or travel far, she’s determined to still enjoy any little “vacation” she can by getting creative!
description.ja: 締め切りに追われる作家のはるかが、忙しい毎日の合間を縫ってわずかな時間で気持ちをリセット。ご近所散策、銭湯、近場グルメ、公園満喫…まとまった休みが取れなくても、遠くへ旅行に行けなくても、少しの発想の切り替えで、ワクワクできる「休み」は満喫できる! 休みが足りないすべての人に、はるかがステキな休日を贈ります!

description.en: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…
description.es: Himari comienza la escuela secundaria y en su primer día atiende el concierto del club de música ligera en el gimnasio de la escuela, enamorándose a primera vista con la cantante Yori y confesándole su amor en los casilleros de zapatos. Buscándo a dicha cantante, Himari se entera de que Yori no es parte del mencionado club y que a ella le gusta tocar música sola en la terraza de la escuela. Allí, se entera de que Yori también se enamoró de ella.
description.fr: Himari est une lycéenne de première année qui, dès le premier jour, assiste à la représentation du club de musique au gymnase de l'école. Elle a eu le coup de foudre pour la chanteuse Yori, à qui elle s'est déclarée devant les casiers du lycée. En cherchant ledit élève plus tard, elle découvre qu'elle ne fait pas vraiment partie du club et qu'elle aime jouer de la musique seule sur le toit. Là, elle découvre que Yori aussi est tombée amoureuse d'elle.
description.ru:
Химари влюбилась в солистку группы, которая выступала на приветственной вечеринке новых студентов. После разговора с Химари Ёри — солистка группы — поняла, что влюбилась в неё с первого взгляда...

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://readmanga.io/proshepchu_tebe_pesniu_o_liubvi__A5238))
description.uk: Життєрадісна, енергійна старшокласниця Хімарі по вуха закохалася у свого семпая, на ім'я Йорі після того, як почула виступ її групи першого дня навчання. Хімарі відразу зізнається Йорі у своїх почуттях і на подив Хімарі, Йорі каже, що вона теж закохана в неї! Але коли Хімарі розуміє, що вони відчувають два різні види кохання, вона починає ставити собі питання, що ж насправді означає "любов".
description.es-la: "Whispering you a love song" es la historia de un amor a primera vista que inicia en la temporada de los cerezos en flor. Himari, una nueva estudiante de la preparatoria, queda fascinada por Yori-senpai, la vocalista de la banda de chicas que se presenta en la ceremonia de inauguración del año escolar.
description.pt-br: Himari é uma caloura do ensino médio que no primeiro dia assiste a apresentação do clube de música light na academia da escola, apaixonando-se pelo veterano e cantor Yori à primeira vista, confessando-se a ela nos armários dos sapatos. Mais tarde, procurando pelo dito veterano, Himari descobre que Yori não faz parte do clube e que, em vez disso, gosta de tocar música sozinha no telhado. Lá, ela descobre que Yori também se apaixonou por ela.

description.en:
Tōyama, an unassuming high school boy who is introverted, is walking the streets at night in search of contraceptives while having sex with his girlfriend, Takai Yumi.

He finally finds a condom vending machine.

Just when he thinks he finally found a condom, his classmate Marika Uehara, a beautiful girl in the upper caste of his class, sees him.

After that, he was a little annoyed that Uehara tried to involved with him in any way.

Uehara, who he hadn’t any contact with before even though they were in the same class, was starting to take an interest in Tōyama.
description.id:
Toyama, seorang anak SMA sederhana yang introvert, berjalan-jalan di malam hari untuk mencari alat kontrasepsi saat berhubungan seks dengan pacarnya, Takai Yumi.

Dia akhirnya menemukan mesin penjual kond*m otomatis.

Tepat ketika dia berpikir dia akhirnya menemukan cond*m, teman sekelasnya Marika Uehara, seorang gadis cantik di kasta atas kelasnya, melihatnya.

Setelah itu, dia sedikit kesal karena Uehara mencoba terlibat dengannya dengan cara apa pun.

Uehara, yang tidak pernah berhubungan dengannya sebelumnya meskipun mereka berada di kelas yang sama, mulai tertarik pada Tōyama.
description.ja:
日陰者の遠山佑希には秘密がある。それは同級生の高井柚実と肉体関係だということ。二人は互いに心までは求めず、都合がいい関係と割り切って接していた。そんなある日、佑希が街角でクラスの人気者の上原麻里花にある出来事を目撃されてしまい……。


* **遠山佑希（とおやま　ゆうき）**
ボッチ気質の陰キャ主人公。読書が趣味で一見大人しく見えるが意外と気が強い。セフレがいるためか余裕があり大人っぽく見えるらしい。

* **高井柚実（たかい　ゆみ）**
佑希のセフレで図書室の住人。佑希以上に存在感が薄く眼鏡をかけ地味な印象。本人は気づいていないが実はかなりの美人。

* **上原麻里花（うえはら　まりか）**
スクールカースト上位で派手な見た目の女子。性格は極めてよくクラスで一番人気。その華やかな見た目は周囲の異性を魅了する。
 
--- 

Hikagemono no Tōyama Yūki ni wa himitsu ga aru. Sore wa dōkyūsei no Takai yūmi to nikutai kankeida to iu koto. Futari wa tagaini kokoro made wa motomezu, tsugōgaī kankei to warikitte sesshite ita. Son'na aru Ni~Tsu, Yūki ga machikado de kurasu no ninki-sha no Uehara Mari hana ni aru dekigoto o mokugeki sa rete shimai....

* **Tōyama Yūki**
Botchi katagi no in kya shujinkō. Dokusho ga shumi de ikken otonashiku mieruga igaito ki ga tsuyoi. Sefure ga iru tame ka yoyū ga ari otonappoku mierurashī. 

* **Takai Yūmi**
Yūki no sefure de tosho-shitsu no jūnin. Yūki ijō ni sonzai-kan ga usuku megane o kake jimina inshō. Hon'nin wa kidzuite inaiga jitsuwa kanari no bijin. 

* **Uehara Marika**
Sukūrukāsuto jōi de hadena mitame no joshi. Seikaku wa kiwamete yoku kurasu de ichiban ninki. Sono hanayakana mitame wa shūi no isei o miryō suru.

description.en:
The conquest story of the final boss protagonist begins here!

"Boot Hour, Shoot Curse" is a VRMMORPG that has no concept of levels or professions. Instead, players must farm experience points to gain new skills and increase their status.
Rare, a girl who participated in the closed beta test, has acquired the hidden skill "Subordinate", which allows her to turn NPCs into her subordinates. The skill also transfers the experience points gained by the subordinates to Rare.

She used the skill to gradually add new NPCs she encountered to her party. As a result of the unprecedented amount of experience gained from her minions, she was able to evolve into a Demon Lord.
description.fr:
L’histoire de la conquête du boss final commence ici !

« Boot Hour, Shoot Curse » est un VRMMORPG qui n’a ni de concept de niveaux ni de métiers. Au lieu de cela, les joueurs doivent accumuler des points d’expérience pour acquérir de nouvelles compétences et améliorer leur statut et leur personnage.
Rare, une jeune fille qui a participé aux tests de la version bêta fermée, a acquis la compétence cachée « Subordonné », qui lui permet de transformer des PNJ en ses subordonnés. Cette compétence transfère également les points d’expérience gagnés par les subordonnés à Rare.
Elle a utilisé cette compétence pour ajouter progressivement à son groupe de nouveaux PNJ qu’elle rencontrait. Et grâce à la quantité d’expérience accumulée par ses subordonnés, elle a pu devenir un Roi Démon
description.ja:
新作VRMMORPG『Boot hour, shoot curse』のオープンβテストに参加した主人公レアが手に入れたのは、隠しスキル『使役』。
ゲームならよくある【レベル】や【ジョブ】というシステムが存在しない代わりに、獲得した【経験値】を使ってスキルを取得したり、ステータスを上昇させたりするこのゲームにおいて、「眷属化したキャラの獲得経験値をすべて自分に集約する」という『使役』はとんでもないスキルだった。

レアは、『使役』を使って出会ったNPCや魔物を次々眷属化。増え続ける【経験値】で自身と配下を強化し続けた結果、いつの間にか「特定災害生物『魔王』」の判定を受けてしまい…!?

ラスボス級主人公によるVRMMO征服譚、ここに開幕!!

description.en:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
description.ru: Часовая Башня — центр магического мира и штаб-квартира «Ассоциации магов», хранящей секреты бесценных таинств. Преподающий здесь лорд факультета современной магии, Эль-Меллой II, по стечению определённых обстоятельств оказывается втянут в борьбу за наследие Замка Разделения, Адра. Только разгадавший тайну ангельских имён, что были даны всем приглашённым и встречаются в нём повсюду, сможет получить его «наследие». Однако даже для высокопоставленных магов Часовой Башни это дело оказалось не простым решением головоломки, а началом волшебного, но в то же время печального инцидента.С этого дела началось досье лорда Эль-Меллоя II, в котором переплелись магия и таинства, иллюзии и загадки...
